Name: Riding Turtle
Notes_2:
The Riding Turtle is one of only a few special mounts that increase your speed in water to that of a normal mount on land. It can be used in any body of water. Its speed is not affected by effects that increase or decrease mount speed.

Note that this is the only trading card mount which is taught by a bound item. Other TCG mount items may be sold or traded before learning, but this one may not.

It can also be found (rarely) on the Black Market Auction House, or as rare loot from Cavedweller murlocs in your Garrison's fishing pond in Draenor. The murlocs can be summoned with Lunarfall Carp (Alliance) or Frostdeep Minnows (Horde), which can occasionally be caught from the same pond once you advance your Fishing Shack to level 3.
Requirements:
This mount is available to all eligible characters on your account.
Level 1
Source:
Trading Card Game: Saltwater Snapjaw from Heroes of Azeroth set
Lunarfall Cavedweller in Lunarfall (Garrison).
Frostdeep Cavedweller in Frostwall (Garrison).
"The great teacher of Azeroth school" promotion (China only).
The Black Market Auction House (rarely)

Name: Winterspring Frostsaber
Notes_2:
This majestic saber is the reward of a fun quest chain in which you raise the mount from a cub - speak to Rivern Frostwind in Winterspring to begin. The quest chain involves returning to Rivern once a day for 20 days and training your cub through the daily quest he assigns you.

Prior to Cataclysm the method to obtain it was quite different - you had to grind reputation with Wintersaber Trainers in what was one of the most intensive reputation grinds in the game.
Requirements:
This mount is available to all eligible characters on your account.
Level 40
Apprentice (75) Riding
Alliance Only
Source: Rivern Frostwind in Frostsaber Rock, Winterspring.
